attributes.action: use advances in technology and make distant open learning a development opportunity in less developed countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ID21 reports on the role institutions can play in being more accessible to countries worldwide - why aren't teachers' sharing their resources more ? Limitations on the abilty to travel mean millions of people receive no opportunity - the petitioner is calling on the PM to let British universities lead the way in this possible initiative - also to boost the economy, companies should pay for submission of "Contact us" ideas and suggestions on web pages - rather than have free consultations. Please legislate for a mechanisms for this to happen. Focus should move from "bums on seats" enrolment policies to encouraging completion, catering globally at the same time.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
